message: ...Huh?
Koujaku isn't there. Neither is Ren.
But then I notice that the door to the balcony is open a crack.
I look out to find Koujaku leaning against the railing.
He's gazing at the city, a thin cigarette between his fingers, blowing white smoke through his pursed lips.
I don't know why, but Koujaku only smokes in my room. Well, on the balcony of my room.
He never does it in front of women or at work, or when he's out drinking. Just here.
I guess he feels like he can let his guard down here.
In public, he never drops his confident smile. He always looks like he's having fun, but maybe it's not so easy to have women hanging off you all the time.
Koujaku brings the cigarette back to his mouth.
Though his hands are angular and masculine, something about the dim light makes his fingers look long and beautiful.
Those fingers must be very nimble, given his line of work.
Koujaku is holding Ren, with Beni on Ren's head. They both appear to be in sleep mode.
I'd be worried about dropping them, but I trust Koujaku not to be careless.
I grab the ashtray I keep in my room and open the door to the balcony.
Koujaku smiles softly upon seeing me.

name: 紅雀
message: "Yo, finished your bath?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "I thought you'd be in the living room."

name: 紅雀
message: "I just needed a little pick-me-up."
Koujaku gestures with his cigarette.

name: 蒼葉
message: "You really like it out here, huh?"

name: 紅雀
message: "Do I? Maybe you're right."

name: 蒼葉
message: "It's not like there's anything to see."

name: 紅雀
message: "I guess... But isn't it better that way, sometimes?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Really? I don't get it."
Koujaku chuckles.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Here."
I present the ashtray and Koujaku stubs out his cigarette. I set it down by my feet and join him at the railing.
Koujaku frowns at me.

name: 紅雀
message: "How many times do I have to tell you..."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hm?"

name: 紅雀
message: "Your hair. You have to dry it better."
Koujaku reaches out.

He's gonna touch my hair!<K>
I flinch at the thought.

But it's not my hair he's going for...<K>
It's my nose!

name: 蒼葉
message: "Gah!"

name: 紅雀
message: "Listen to the guy who cuts hair for a living."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Stop it!"
I shake him off, but he just smiles.

name: 紅雀
message: "It's gotten pretty long. Still cutting it yourself?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah. I'm not really looking for criticism from a pro. I just do whatever."

name: 紅雀
message: "I mean, it's not half bad. Everything's more or less where it should be."

name: 蒼葉
message: "For real? OMG, Koujaku complimented me?! I could just die!"

name: 紅雀
message: "What's that supposed to be?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "I'm just imitating your fans."
Koujaku laughs.
I have a good reason for not getting my hair cut.
I don't know why, but I was born with feeling in my hair. That means cutting it is seriously painful.
Once it gets past my shoulders, the sensation is dull enough that I can cut just the ends.
People teased me relentlessly when I was little, saying I looked like a girl because of my long hair.
Even a light touch sends chills up my spine, so when they thought it would be funny to pull my hair... needless to say, it was hell.
When bullies tormented me, it was always Koujaku who came to my rescue.
Actually, Koujaku thought I was a girl at first too. He was pretty surprised when he found out he was wrong, but his attitude toward me didn't really change.
I have to admit, that made me happy.

name: 紅雀
message: "You know, you're lucky to have such beautiful hair. You better take care of it."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...I've always wondered how you can say stuff like that. That's one thing that definitely hasn't changed since we were kids."

name: 紅雀
message: "I only say it because I mean it. Plus, I always knew it made you happy, even though you tried to hide it."
Koujaku affects a far-off, dreaming look, and I give him the most annoyed glare I can muster.

name: 蒼葉
message: "I was a kid. I don't really remember."
A dull pain shoots down my shoulders as I gently dry off the tips of my hair.
This pain... Is it still from Rhyme?

name: 紅雀
message: "What's the matter?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Nothing."

name: 紅雀
message: "It doesn't look like nothing. And you were out of it earlier too."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Uh, well..."

name: 紅雀
message: "What's with you? You've been weird all night."

name: 蒼葉
message: "No I haven't."
Should I tell Koujaku about Rhyme?
Koujaku can be pretty perceptive, and he already realizes something's going on...
If I try to lie now, he's not gonna buy it...

name: 蒼葉
message: "Well... something weird happened today. Like, um... I guess I got forced into a Rhyme match or something..."

name: 紅雀
message: "Forced into a Rhyme match?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "It just happened outta nowhere, you know? One minute I'm on my way to make a delivery, and the next, I'm standing on a Rhyme field."

name: 紅雀
message: "Are you sure this wasn't a dream?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "It wasn't a dream."

name: 紅雀
message: "So you're telling me... Wait, is that even possible?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "That's what I'd like to know. It happened near your territory. In one of those alleys."

name: 紅雀
message: "I've never heard of anything like that."

name: 蒼葉
message: "That wasn't the only weird part. Usui wasn't there."

name: 紅雀
message: "Now that is weird. That thing's supposed to be in charge of Rhyme, right? It brings the screen and ring and stuff."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Right? Also..."
I tell Koujaku about the rabbit head guy, including the fact that he knew my name.
As he listens, Koujaku's frown grows. He lets out a groan when I've finished.

name: 紅雀
message: "It sounds like you got ganked."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Ganked?"

name: 紅雀
message: "I've only heard about it from the guys in my gang, but apparently, there are guys who can force you to fight."

name: 紅雀
message: "There's no Usui, no rules or limits. I hear some guys have ended up in the hospital."

name: 蒼葉
message: "So that's what happened to me? I got ganked or whatever?"

name: 紅雀
message: "It's possible. Still..."

name: 紅雀
message: "...I don't like it."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Like what?"

name: 紅雀
message: "You got away this time, but what if it happens again? That shit can mess you up, right?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "What I don't get is I don't even play Rhyme. Did he confuse me with someone else?"

name: 紅雀
message: "You could've been a random target, or maybe someone just hates your guts."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah, right. I'm not you."

name: 紅雀
message: "Ouch. But you said he knew your name, right?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Well... yeah."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Koujaku?"
Koujaku falls silent, a troubled expression on his face.
A few moments later, he sighs.

name: 紅雀
message: "...Sorry. I think I'm actually gonna head home. I forgot there's something I need to do."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Huh? Oh, sure."
Koujaku pushes off the handrail.

name: 紅雀
message: "You sure you're okay?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah."

name: 紅雀
message: "I'll take your word for it. But if something happens, you better tell me."

name: 蒼葉
message: "I know."

name: 紅雀
message: "Good."
Koujaku flashes me a knowing smile and places Ren in my hands.
Then he collects Beni from Ren's head and tucks him into his kimono.

name: 紅雀
message: "Night."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Night."
Koujaku waves farewell and heads out.
